date_created.label: Date created
date_created.help_text: The moment when the item was created.

date_modified.label: Date modified
date_modified.help_text: The last moment when the item was modified. A value in year 1750 indicates the value is unknown

parties_and_terms.label: Parties and terms
parties_and_terms.help_text: Parties and terms of agreement (ex. Board Member NY Ballet)

redacted.label: Redacted
redacted.help_text: Does the agreement row contain redaction(s)?

financial_disclosure.label: Financial disclosure
financial_disclosure.help_text: The financial disclosure associated with this agreement.

date_created.label: Date created
date_created.help_text: The moment when the item was created.

date_modified.label: Date modified
date_modified.help_text: The last moment when the item was modified. A value in year 1750 indicates the value is unknown

value_code.label: Value code
value_code.help_text: Form code for the value of the judicial debt.

redacted.label: Redacted
redacted.help_text: Does the debt row contain redaction(s)?

financial_disclosure.label: Financial disclosure
financial_disclosure.help_text: The financial disclosure associated with this debt.

date_created.label: Date created
date_created.help_text: The moment when the item was created.

date_modified.label: Date modified
date_modified.help_text: The last moment when the item was modified. A value in year 1750 indicates the value is unknown

source.label: Source
source.help_text: Source of the judicial gift. (ex. Alta Ski Area).

description.label: Description
description.help_text: Description of the gift (ex. Season Pass).

redacted.label: Redacted
redacted.help_text: Does the gift row contain redaction(s)?

financial_disclosure.label: Financial disclosure
financial_disclosure.help_text: The financial disclosure associated with this gift.

date_created.label: Date created
date_created.help_text: The moment when the item was created.

date_modified.label: Date modified
date_modified.help_text: The last moment when the item was modified. A value in year 1750 indicates the value is unknown

page_number.label: Page number
page_number.help_text: The page number the investment is listed on.  This is used to generate links directly to the PDF page.

description.label: Description
description.help_text: Name of investment (ex. APPL common stock).

redacted.label: Redacted
redacted.help_text: Does the investment row contains redaction(s)?

income_during_reporting_period_code.label: Income during reporting period code
income_during_reporting_period_code.help_text: Increase in investment value - as a form code

income_during_reporting_period_type.label: Income during reporting period type
income_during_reporting_period_type.help_text: Type of investment (ex. Rent, Dividend). Typically standardized but not universally.

gross_value_code.label: Gross value code
gross_value_code.help_text: Investment total value code at end of reporting period as code (ex. J (1-15,000)).

gross_value_method.label: Gross value method
gross_value_method.help_text: Investment valuation method code (ex. Q = Appraisal)

transaction_during_reporting_period.label: Transaction during reporting period
transaction_during_reporting_period.help_text: Transaction of investment during reporting period (ex. Buy, Sold)

transaction_date_raw.label: Transaction date raw
transaction_date_raw.help_text: Date of the transaction, if any (D2)

transaction_value_code.label: Transaction value code
transaction_value_code.help_text: Transaction value amount, as form code (ex. J (1-15,000)).

transaction_gain_code.label: Transaction gain code
transaction_gain_code.help_text: Gain from investment transaction if any (ex. A (1-1000)).

has_inferred_values.label: Has inferred values
has_inferred_values.help_text: If the investment name was inferred during extraction. This is common because transactions usually list the first purchase of a stock and leave the name value blank for subsequent purchases or sales.

financial_disclosure.label: Financial disclosure
financial_disclosure.help_text: The financial disclosure associated with this investment.

date_created.label: Date created
date_created.help_text: The moment when the item was created.

date_modified.label: Date modified
date_modified.help_text: The last moment when the item was modified. A value in year 1750 indicates the value is unknown

source_type.label: Source type
source_type.help_text: Source and type of non-investment income for the judge (ex. Teaching a class at U. Miami).

income_amount.label: Income amount
income_amount.help_text: Amount earned by judge, often a number, but sometimes with explanatory text (e.g. 'Income at firm: $xyz').

redacted.label: Redacted
redacted.help_text: Does the non-investment income row contain redaction(s)?

financial_disclosure.label: Financial disclosure
financial_disclosure.help_text: The financial disclosure associated with this non-investment income.

date_created.label: Date created
date_created.help_text: The moment when the item was created.

date_modified.label: Date modified
date_modified.help_text: The last moment when the item was modified. A value in year 1750 indicates the value is unknown

organization_name.label: Organization name
organization_name.help_text: Name of organization or entity (ex. Trust #1).

redacted.label: Redacted
redacted.help_text: Does the position row contain redaction(s)?

financial_disclosure.label: Financial disclosure
financial_disclosure.help_text: The financial disclosure associated with this financial position.

date_created.label: Date created
date_created.help_text: The moment when the item was created.

date_modified.label: Date modified
date_modified.help_text: The last moment when the item was modified. A value in year 1750 indicates the value is unknown

source.label: Source
source.help_text: Source of the reimbursement (ex. FSU Law School).

date_raw.label: Date raw
date_raw.help_text: Dates as a text string for the date of reimbursements. This is often conference dates (ex. June 2-6, 2011).

location.label: Location
location.help_text: Location of the reimbursement (ex. Harvard Law School, Cambridge, MA).

purpose.label: Purpose
purpose.help_text: Purpose of the reimbursement (ex. Baseball announcer).

financial_disclosure.label: Financial disclosure
financial_disclosure.help_text: The financial disclosure associated with this reimbursement.

date_created.help_text: The moment when the item was created.

date_modified.label: Date modified
date_modified.help_text: The last moment when the item was modified. A value in year 1750 indicates the value is unknown

source_type.label: Source type
source_type.help_text: Source and type of income of judicial spouse (ex. Salary from Bank job).

redacted.label: Redacted
redacted.help_text: Does the spousal-income row contain redaction(s)?

financial_disclosure.label: Financial disclosure
financial_disclosure.help_text: The financial disclosure associated with this spouse income.

date_created.label: Date created
date_created.help_text: The moment when the item was created.

date_modified.label: Date modified
date_modified.help_text: The last moment when the item was modified. A value in year 1750 indicates the value is unknown

year.label: Year
year.help_text: The year that the disclosure corresponds with

thumbnail_status.label: Thumbnail status
thumbnail_status.help_text: The status of the thumbnail generation

page_count.label: Page count
page_count.help_text: The number of pages in the disclosure report

sha1.label: Sha1
sha1.help_text: SHA1 hash of the generated PDF

addendum_content_raw.label: Addendum content raw
addendum_content_raw.help_text: Raw content of addendum with whitespace preserved.

addendum_redacted.label: Addendum redacted
addendum_redacted.help_text: Is the addendum partially or completely redacted?

has_been_extracted.label: Has been extracted
has_been_extracted.help_text: Have we successfully extracted the data from PDF?
